title: Uploading a Folder with Files (Bulk Upload) (/sdks/(clis)/ardrive-cli/(working-with-files)/uploading-a-folder-with-files-bulk-upload)
content: Users can perform a bulk upload by using the upload-file command on a target folder. The command will reconstruct the folder hierarchy on local disk as ArFS folders on the permaweb and upload each file into their corresponding folders:
